DocuMenTor

Generate, validate and maintain documentation with ease. Lightweight, extensible and focused on developer workflows.

Get started

Fast authoring

Markdown-first editor, quick previews and reusable templates.

CI-friendly

Integrates with GitHub Actions to validate docs on every PR.

Customizable

Theming and plugins let you shape the output to your needs.

Quick start

Clone the repo, edit docs/index.md and push to GitHub to publish.
